programme.title: From There To Here

programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E01, Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E03, Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. Camera Tracking - The array of special cameras that follow a spacecraft at launch. The International Space Station - The building and operation.

programme.title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E04, Project Gemini Commences - Did Gemini give the US a lead in the space race? Venus Express - The last days of ESA's Venus probe. EMU - NASA's Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Deep Space Communications - ESA's worldwide network of giant dishes.

programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E05, Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E06, Project Gemini: Docking and EVA - In the final phase of the Gemini program NASA struggles with docking and spacewalks. Curiosity Roving Mars - On the surface of Mars the Curiosity rover is changing the way we think about the red planet.

programme.title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E07, The Apollo Program Begins - At the very beginning of NASA's moon project things go wrong. Caves - ESA's special training program for astronauts. Planck - Mapping the cosmic microwave background radiation.

programme.title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E08, Rebuilding Project Apollo - After the Apollo 1 disaster NASA resumes manned space flight. Orbiting Carbon Observatory 2 - Monitoring the Earth's Co2 levels in unprecedented detail. Zero Gravity Training - Parabolic flights.

programme.title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E09, Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E10, To the Moon - The Apollo program achieves its major objective. Dragon, Falcon and Spacex - New directions in re-usable spacecraft. Gaia- Mapping our galaxy in unprecedented detail.

programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E11, The Beginning of the End - After the first Moon landing the Apollo science program was about to start in earnest but people were losing interest. Apollo Gets Complicated - New technology is added that extends the reach of the Apollo program.

programme.title: The Shuttle Program, The Challenger Disaster & Return to Space
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E12, The Shuttle Program - The first re-useable spacecraft. The Challenger Disaster - Pressing launch schedules lead to carelessness and the loss of the Challenger. Return to Space - A re-designed shuttle is back in space with a redefined role.

programme.title: The Space Shuttle Matures, Complex Space Construction & The Final Years of the Space Shuttle
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E13, The Space Shuttle Matures - The Space Transportation System changes the nature of orbital missions. Complex Construction in Space - Confidence in the shuttle begins to return and engineers for get the lessons of the past.

programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Delta and the Bannermen, S07E01, The Doctor and Mel end up in South Wales along with an assassin and his intended victim...

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Delta and the Bannermen, S07E02, Gavrok and the Bannermen have arrived on Earth, searching for Delta and slaughter the holidaymakers without compunction to draw her out.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Delta and the Bannermen, S07E03, As Billy and Ray do what they can to help save Delta and the baby, the Doctor and Goronwy the beekeeper face Gavrok and his Bannermen one last time...

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Dragonfire, S01E01, Mel and the Doctor are in for a cool reception on the trading colony Iceworld, where they discover excitable teenage waitress Ace, space maverick Sabalom Glitz, and legends of dragons and treasure.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Dragonfire, S01E02, The time travellers, accompanied by Glitz and Ace, search the ice caves for the treasure which is supposed to be guarded by a fearsome dragon. Little do they are leading Kane straight to it.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Dragonfire, S01E03, Having sold their souls to him years ago, Kane's disaffected staff plot to kill him. Meanwhile, he plots to obtain the dragon's treasure so he can escape from Iceworld and wreak havoc once more.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E01, In Shoreditch, 1963, the Doctor’s past begins to catch up with him at the Totter’s Lane junkyard where his adventures began - and to where an old terror is returning.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E02, Renegade Daleks battle Imperial Daleks for control of the Hand of Omega and Ace takes them on single-handedly at Coal Hill School, while Ratcliffe makes his move.

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E03, The Doctor discovers the difference between the two Dalek factions and why they want a stellar manipulator. He hopes Captain Gilmore's people are up to the task ahead.

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E04, The streets of East London shake under a civil war bering fought between the Daleks, as the Doctor forces the Dalek Emperor to reveal himself to be Davros, waging one last battle.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Battlefield, S01E01, As UNIT is transporting a nuclear warhead around Carbury, knights in armour arrive to continue waging a war that began thousands of years ago, but in a wholly different dimension.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Battlefield, S01E02, The Doctor and Ace explore King Arthur’s spaceship deep under Lake Vortigern, while Brigadier Lethbridge-Stewart arrives in Carbury where he encounters Morgaine...

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Battlefield, S01E03, Furious at her inability to find and engage Arthur in battle, Morgaine threatens to unleash the Destroyer upon the planet unless the Doctor gives her what she wants.

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Battlefield, S01E04, The Brigadier slays the Destroyer while Morgaine takes control of UNIT's nuclear warhead and prepares to start a countdown that will destroy Earth forever.

programme.title: The Dead Planet
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daleks, S01E01, The travellers venture out on to the surface of a new world. Everything is dead but beyond a petrified jungle, they see a huge metal city which the Doctor is determined to explore.

programme.title: The Survivors
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daleks, S01E02, Looking for Barbara - the Doctor, Ian, and Susan discover that they have exposed to lethal doses of radiation. The travellers are confronted by the city’s inhabitants – the Daleks!

programme.title: The Escape
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daleks, S01E03, Fearful of a Thal attack, the Daleks force Susan to trick the Thals. Realising that the Daleks’ are planning an ambush, the four travellers try to escape and warn the Thals.

programme.title: The Ambush
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daleks, S01E04, Pretending to be a Dalek, Ian finds that he is trapped inside the casing. The Doctor, Susan, and Barbara have no choice but to abandon Ian as the real Daleks arrive and attack.

Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S11E10, This episode includes: Heather Tallchief & UD, Burned Evidence, Survivor and Niqui Bride-to-Be.

programme.title: Episode: 7

programme.title: Episode: 20
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S03E20, This episode includes: Edgar Cayce, Crystal and War of the Depues & UD.

programme.title: Episode: 1
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S12E01, This episode includes: Burning Bed, Freshwater Runs Still & UD, Starfyre Fugitive & UD, Vanished in the Heartland & UD and Update: Sweet Sue.

programme.title: Episode: 11
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S02E11, This episode includes: Fool's Gold, Update: Baltimore Babynapping, Suicide Homicide, Baby Broker and Donald Eugene Webb.

programme.title: Episode: 11
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S08E11, This episode includes: Direct Contact, Green River Killer & UD, Foster Son & UD and Murder in Connecticut & UD.

programme.title: Episode: 15
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S08E15, This episode includes: Massachusetts Marine, UD: Taunting Bank Robber, Packer Church Fire , Ms. Miracle and Train Wreck Amnesia & UD.

programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S05E11, This episode includes: Polio & UD, Missing Gringo, UD: Lucky Lost Love, Poison Shake & UD and UD: Goldie's Girl.

programme.title: Episode: 3
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S01E03, This episode includes: Amnesia & UD, Carlucci & UD, Math Teacher Escape & UD and Beale's Cypher.

programme.title: Episode: 20
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S04E20, This episode includes: Magnetic Attraction (Pts. 1 & 2 + UD), Oregon Heir, UD: The Man Who Never Was and UD: Money Clip Murder.

programme.title: Episode: 11
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S07E11, This episode includes: San Marino Bones & UD, Phantom Sub, Police Captain's Death, UD: Baby Girl X and School Bus Family & UD.

programme.title: Episode: 15
programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S03E15, This episode includes: Teen Tragedy, Update: Jim and Tammi, State Department Murder and Lost Adams Diggings.

programme.title: Danny Bible/License To Kill
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E21, A Texas woman's murder is finally solved when the killer's plan to kill a second woman and stuff her into a duffel bag goes awry.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E21, A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: The School Teacher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E04, When 25-year-old school teacher Christy Mirack is found murdered in her apartment in 1992, there is no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: Love and Hate
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E07, Near what's known as the hanging tree, the mutilated body of Timothy Coggins is found in late 1983. The investigation is thwarted and the case freezes for over 30 years, until a newly elected sheriff vows to bring the killers to justice.

programme.title: Killer on Campus / The Bow Hunter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E15, Thirty-two years after the killing of University of Michigan law student Jane Mixer, police use DNA found on her pantyhose to finally track down the killer.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: The Original Nightstalker
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E05, In the 1980s, a serial killer prowled the posh streets of Orange County. Police were unaware of the serial attacks until 1996, when DNA revealed the killer's secret and they linked four murders to a single DNA profile.

programme.title: Taken in Tacoma
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E06, When 13-year-old Jennifer Bastian is abducted and murdered in August of 1986, residents of Tacoma panic. This is the second young girl killed in five months. Convinced a predator is loose, Police embark on a 32-year inquiry.

programme.title: Murder In the Midwest
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E03, The body of Lori Nesson is found in a ditch in 1974, yet her death is not ruled a homicide. After four decades, the cause of death is changed to homicide, and the search begins for a killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E4016, DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Cold Ashes
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E20, When a deadly house fire claims the life of a family in rural Oklahoma, investigators suspect foul play and it sends a mother on a decades-long crusade to find out what happened to her missing teenage daughter and best friend.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E20, Police run down more than 11,000 leads before coming up with a suspect in the murders of three Virginia girls, and the abduction and strangulation of a California woman continue to baffle the investigators more than 11 years after the crime.

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.

programme.title: Mistaken for a Killer/The Boy and the Monster
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E27, Advances in DNA technology that take place over 20 years help police to finally identify the man who brutally stabbed two women to death.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E15, Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

programme.title: Vanished in Virginia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E05, When a 30-year-old mother fails to report for duty in Virginia, the Army lists her as AWOL. Her family immediately suspects foul play. They embark on a 13-year quest for answers before an eyewitness blows the case wide open.

programme.title: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E01, A kidnapper grabs 8-year-old Chad Choice from his home in Texas, then torments his parents with two ransom demands. The case goes cold until the parents receive a chilling package in the mail that contains a letter--and a skull.

programme.title: Ring of Terror
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Ring of Terror, S02E06, A medical student (played by George B. Mather) is tormented by a frat-house hazing after being asked to remove a ring from the finger of a corpse.

programme.title: The Castle of FuManchu
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Castle of FuManchu, S03E23, The Castle of FuManchu tries to conquer the world by turning all water into ice.

programme.title: Hercules Unchained
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hercules Unchained, S04E08, While trying to resolve a quarrel between warring brothers Eteocles and Polynices, Hercules is taken captive by Queen Omphale of Lydia.

programme.title: The Killer Shrews
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Killer Shrews, S04E07, An experiment on a remote island goes awfully awry when Professor Marlowe Cragis and his research team accidentally create giant, venomous shrews.

programme.title: The Sword And The Dragon
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Sword And The Dragon, S06E17, A Russian hero plots an invasion against the Mongols in The Sword and the Dragon. Mike and the Bots create their own topical comedy show, reenact the table cloth scene from the movie, and try their hand at playing Dungeons and Dragons.

programme.title: The Phantom Planet
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Phantom Planet, S09E02, When US astronaut Captain Frank Chapman’s military spaceship is damaged by asteroids, he lands safely on the giant asteroid Rheton.

programme.title: The Unearthly
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Unearthly, S03E20, A mad scientist creates havoc when an experiment to stop the aging process goes awry.

programme.title: Hercules Against the Moon Men
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S04E10, A race of evil Moon aliens lands in ancient Greece, wreaking havoc for years on the city of Samar. It’s up to the mighty Hercules to end the chaos.

programme.title: The Touch of Satan
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Touch of Satan, S09E08, An aimless young man encounters a rural family that seems to have some secrets.

programme.title: Village of the Giants
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Village of the Giants, S05E23, In Village of the Giants, a child genius creates a growth formula that ends up in the hands of some incredibly annoying teenagers.

programme.title: Warrior Of The Lost World
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Warrior Of The Lost World, S06E01, A nameless hero and his talking motorcycle fight an evil dictator in a post-apocalyptic world.
Kitten Bowl II, 20150201000000 +0000, A feline competition featuring two preliminary rounds followed by a championship match. Hosted by Beth Stern, Boomer Esiason, John Sterling and Mary Carillo.

Kitten Bowl III, 20160207000000 +0000, Hallmark Channel presents the nation's most athletic, adorable and adoptable kittens in a claws-out, paws-out showdown for Kitten Bowl III. Hosted by Beth Stern, Boomer Esiason, John Sterling and Mary Carillo.

Little John, 20020505000000 +0000, An estranged father's failing health forces a reunion between a judge and the child she gave up for adoption. Stars Ving Rhames, Gloria Reuben, Patty Duke, and Robert Bailey, Jr. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

A Tale of Two Cities, 19801202000000 +0000, Based on Charles Dickens' classic, two identical men (both played by Chris Sarandon) - one from England and one from France - fall for the same woman during the height of the French Revolution.
Pack of Lies, 19870426000000 +0000, A thriller about a middle class family which are suddenly thrown into a world of international intrigue. Stars Ellen Burstyn and Alan Bates.

Sandra Brown's White Hot, 20160417000000 +0000, After her younger brother Danny dies, Sayre Hoyle breaks her vow to never return home. But when police discover that Danny's death was a homicide, Sayre is forced to confront her father along with a powder keg of old hatreds.

Riding the Bus With My Sister, 20050501000000 +0000, A photographer and her developmentally challenged sister begin living together when their father dies. Stars Andie MacDowell and Rosie O'Donnell. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Awakenings & Revelations
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S02E04, Hallmark Original Series. Elizabeth begins to question the direction of her heart and feelings for Jack.

programme.title: Heart and Home
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S02E05, Hallmark Original Series. Elizabeth and Jack receive upsetting news from their families in Hamilton.

programme.title: Hide And Seek
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E03, McKay (David Hewlett) volunteers to be the first to try Beckett's (Paul McGillion) newest ATA gene therapy. But things go wrong when the device cannot be removed, and is stopping Dr. McKay from being able to eat or drink and endangering his life.

programme.title: Thirty Eight Minutes
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E04, The Stargate team must rush to save Major John Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) after he becomes lodged in the Stargate, with only 38 minutes until the gate automatically disengages, and Sheppard is expelled into space, where he will surely asphyxiate.

programme.title: Cloverdale
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E05, While exploring a new planet, Lt. Scott is attacked by an aggressive plant-like creature that infects him. Scott's circumstances turn dire and Tamara must search for a way to stop the alien infection from spreading while more creatures move in.

programme.title: Trial And Error
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E06, Col. Young (Louis Ferreira) is plagued by a recurring vision wherein Destiny is attacked and destroyed by aliens. After placing the crew on high alert, he starts to feel that he may be losing his mind and questions his ability as the commander!

programme.title: The Greater Good
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E07, When Destiny comes upon a heavily damaged ship, Dr. Rush and Col. Young decide to make a dangerous space-suited expedition to the ship. But an unexpected turn of events leaves Dr. Rush and Col. Young stranded aboard the strange vessel.

programme.title: Malice
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E08, Lucian Alliance prisoner Simeon escapes, creating a manhunt on a remote planet. But Homeworld Command orders he be captured alive, believing Simeon has valuable information. Simeon must be brought back to the Destiny before he kills or is killed.

programme.title: Allegiance
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E09, The Tok'ra must take refuge from the Goa'uld at the SGC Alpha Site occupied by Jaffa. Bad blood between the races begins to boil as an assassin wreaks havoc on the camp. Can O'Neill stop the bloodshed before the assassin escapes with coordinates?

programme.title: Cure
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E10, SG-1 visits Pangar, a planet inhabited by humans who have developed a drug that makes their immune systems perfect. Unknown to SG-1 is the means by which the drug is produced, a startling discovery that may hold the key to the origins of the Tok'ra!

programme.title: Prometheus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E11, Rogue NSA officers hijack the X-303 spaceship and demand that Adrian Conrad be brought to the ship. Using his Goa'uld knowledge, Conrad activates the X-303 and takes the ship light-years from Earth as O'Neill and Teal'c stage a daring rescues.

programme.title: Unnatural Selection
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E12, When SG-1 is marooned in deep space, Thor comes to the rescue. He then seek O'Neill's help to combat the Replicators. Convinced they will attack earth if not stopped, O'Neill stages a daring mission to stop the Replicators once and for all.

programme.title: Sight Unseen
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E13, SG-1 returns from a mission with an artifact that triggers the ability to see hideous yet harmless life forms in a parallel reality. As the effect spreads to civilians, O'Neill and his team must find a solution before mass hysteria breaks out.

programme.title: Smoke & Mirrors
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E14, Senator Kinsey suffers an assassination attempt while campaigning for the presidency, and O'Neill is caught on tape leaving the building where the shots were fired. With O'Neill behind bars, Carter, Teal'c and Jonas must prove his innocence.

programme.title: Paradise Lost
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E15, Colonel Maybourne visits O'Neill and claims to have a key to a cache of alien technology, but demands a presidential pardon in exchange for it. When SG-1 accompanies Maybourne to retrieve it, they find his intentions may not be all they seem.

programme.title: Metamorphosis
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E16, SG-1 discovers that Nirrti is mutating the inhabitants of an unexplored planet with a machine that rearranges their DNA. Captured in an attempt to stop her, O'Neill must find a way to escape before he and SG-1 are subjected to the same fate.

programme.title: Disclosure
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E17, General Hammond and the Pentagon are forced to reveal the existence of the Stargate to other world governments. Senator Kinsey suggests that General Hammond be relieved of his command and that the civilian-run NID oversee the Stargate program.

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E18, SG-1 discovers three human survivors on an off-world planet who claim to be under attack by hostile aliens. While Carter helps repair the ship's computer, she learns that the survivors are hiding a secret…and things may not be all they seem.

programme.title: The Changeling
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E19, Teal'c mysteriously begins to hallucinate and is haunted by visions of an existence where he is a human being. As his paranoia deepens, Teal'c must rely on the help of friend Daniel Jackson to determine where his dreams end...and his reality begins.

programme.title: Ricochet
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E29, Kelly finds it impossible to trust Brandon as he works late every night for several weeks. Noah entertains Gwyneth, a longtime friend. David becomes extremely jumpy after being robbed at an ATM.

programme.title: The Fundamental Things Apply
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E30, Brandon and Kelly try to help a Bosnian refugee find his wife; Donna puts on a fashion show; Gwyneth takes a page from Valerie's book after admitting feelings for Noah; Steve learns Sarah is married.

programme.title: Budget Cuts
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E02, After learning that the clinic may lose funding, Kelly asks Brandon to write a story to generate publicity. David believes that Valerie killed her father in self-defense and should move on.

programme.title: Dealer's Choice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E03, Abby announces that she and Carl are planning to elope in Las Vegas, and asks Val to be her maid of honor. Kelly begs Val to let her tag along on the trip because she believes that Brandon is seeing someone else.

programme.title: Don't Ask, Don't Tell
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E04, Carl decides to annul his marriage to Abby because he believes that he has a future with Valerie. Kelly notices that a store is for lease and decides that she and Donna should open a boutique.

programme.title: Brandon Leaves
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E05, Brandon announces that he has accepted a job with the Washington bureau of the New York Chronicle. Kelly and Donna prepare to open their store, Now Wear This. Valerie seeks legal advice from Matt.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E06, Kelly decides to help Leah and her daughter skip town and assume a new identity. Valerie elects to throw a massive rave as a farewell party before turning herself in to the police.

programme.title: You Say Goodbye, I Say Hello
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E07, As Kelly and Valerie pack Brandon's belongings for shipment, Kelly discovers a letter in which Val advised Brandon not to marry her. She turns everyone against Val and gets them to boycott her Thanksgiving gathering.

programme.title: I'm Back Because

programme.title: Slipping Away
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E17, Kelly and Dylan agree to go to Mexico and obtain medication for Lauren. Donna agrees to a date with the persistent David. Gina discovers that her mother spent most of the money she earned skating as a minor.

programme.title: The Leprechaun

programme.title: Silent Night Baywatch Night, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E11, Matt and Hobie rescue a young boy who is being harassed by a thug and take care of him until they can get him to his mother, but he seems to be hiding a deep dark secret. Meanwhile, CJ falls for a handsome young man who turns out to be taboo.

programme.title: Silent Night Baywatch Night, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E12, Joey joins Mitch and Hobie in decorating for Christmas. CJ has a great time working with Father Ryan but starts to worry that he may misinterpret her warmth as flirting, and that he may be considering quitting the priesthood for her.

programme.title: Rubber Ducky
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E13, Logan's visa is soon to expire, and he will be sent back to Australia unless he gets a green card. He plans on earning the money to purchase one in an upcoming boat race. Meanwhile Mitch’s mother visits.

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E14, Stephanie is kidnapped by an eco-terrorist. The Baywatch team must stop the terrorist before she blows up an oil rig with Stephanie constrained inside it!

programme.title: Seize the Day
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E15, Mitch proposes to Tracy, but the happy moment is short-lived as she reveals she has a terminal illness. With the team being short-staffed it is up to Logan and Caroline to deal with reckless wave runners.

programme.title: A Little Help From My Friends
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E16, Mitch is still mourning Tracy’s death, so Hobie seeks help from a radio show to help Mitch recover. Caroline resuscitates a man with AIDS, which puts a strain on her relationship with Logan. And CJ enters a ballroom dancing competition.

programme.title: Father's Day
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E17, Mitch receives a mysterious package his father had put together before he died. Mitch and his father never saw eye-to-eye, but this gift impacts Mitch more than he ever thought possible. Logan visits a hypnotist to deal with a past trauma.

programme.title: Fire With Fire
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E18, Andy, an old friend of Mitch, visits Baywatch to complete four days of lifeguard service in order to remain on the active roster. But Andy's strong-arm tactics do not sit well with the other lifeguards.

programme.title: Deep Trouble
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E19, Matt and CJ stumble upon a homeless man who shockingly turns out to be someone they know very well. Meanwhile, Mitch must rescue a boy's brother from drug smugglers so the boy can receive a life-saving transplant of his brother's bone marrow.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E20, When testing out a new flying machine, Mitch spots a makeshift raft with a stranded woman in it. Mitch must help the Chinese woman find her sister. Back at headquarters, Matt and Garner deal with a beach robbery scam.

programme.title: The Runaways
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E21, Prominent British businessman Richard Branson visits Baywatch to perform several risky stunts, putting the lifeguards on high alert. Meanwhile, Mitch has to save one of Kaye's employees whose violent husband has come looking for her.

programme.title: Wet and Wild
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E22, Hobie is thrilled when the “Johnny Danger Stunt Show" comes to the beach, but Mitch finds Johnny has questionable morals and is worried Hobie may follow his example. Matt is accused of sexual harassment by bad girl lifeguard Neely.

programme.title: Trapped Beneath the Sea, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E01, Mitch considers a new career working with Garner as a private eye. Logan cheats on Caroline again. The explosion of an offshore oil rig endangers Stephanie, Cody, and Neely.

programme.title: Trapped Beneath the Sea, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E02, As the crippled oil rig sinks and floods with water, Cody, Neely, and Stephanie begin a desperate rescue effort to save the two young couples, and themselves, until the Baywatch lifeguards can arrive to help.

programme.title: Hot Stuff
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E03, Kaye Morgan asks Hobie to volunteer at a school for young blind children. Things take a dangerous turn when a huge brush fire traps Hobie and the blind children in the hills, and Mitch is the only one who can save them.

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E04, Caroline tries to stop her sister from making the worst mistake of her life. Cody and Neely rescue two surfers that fall ill due to a highly polluted beach. Mitch enlists the Beach Boys for a benefit concert to raise money to clean up the pollution.

programme.title: To Everything There is a Season
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E05, Mitch's mother arrives in town for a visit, and after some strange occurrences, he insists she sees a doctor. Meanwhile, Cody loses the motivation to continue his Olympic training and it is up to Stephanie to reinspire him.
